titleStmt.title: The sinner's tears, in meditations and prayers. By Tho. Fettiplace. Dom: Pet: Cantab.
titleStmt.author: Fettiplace, Thomas, 1601 or 2-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Humphrey Moseley, and are to be sold at his shop at the Prince's Armes in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy E.1529[1]: "Nou. 16."; on E.1328[1]: "12 Feb: 1652"; the 3 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library.
